Class EMSReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.baconfiesta.ems.models.EmergencyReport.EMSReport

  • public class EMSReport
extends java.lang.Object
    A report generator class in the system to create different kind of reports

      • generateRecordReport

        public static java.io.File generateRecordReport(EmergencyRecord emergencyRecord,
                                                java.lang.String filename)
        \brief Generates a detailed report for a unique emergency record
        Parameters:
        emergencyRecord - the emergency record to generate a report for
        filename - the name of the file (and its path) where we want to store the report

      • generateStatsReport

        public static void generateStatsReport(EmergencyRecord[] emergencyRecords,
                                       java.lang.String filename)
                                throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        \brief Generates a detailed report and statistics for several emergency records
        Parameters:
        emergencyRecords - the array of emergency records to generate a report for
        filename - the name of the file (and its path) where we want to store the report
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
